name: Cloud-Runners
description:
This game was made for the Finnish college jam #4 by Ryan Byrne, Ciaran Fox and Sean Park.

Cloud-Runners takes place an a alternative future where both magic and science have combined to allow for the creation of miracles such as floating cities however this rapid advancement has caused the appearance of strange anomalies that threaten the stability of the sky city. As a cloud runner, its your job to scan these anomalies using your parkour skills and the city itself to your advantage to scan as many as possible

scan as many anomalies as possible before the time runs out, compete with your friends to see who can gather the most score!

Cloud-Runner is a labor of love project created by 3 passionate developers for the Finnish collage jam 4
